name: GetMarketingEventParticipationBreakdown
description:
Retrieve the participation breakdown for a marketing event.

This tool fetches the participation breakdown for a specified marketing event, filtered by externalAccountId and externalEventId. It provides detailed insights on event participation metrics.

parameters.name: external_account_id
parameters.description: The ID associated with the marketing event's account in the external application.

value_schema.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application.

parameters.name: external_event_id
parameters.description: The ID of the marketing event in the external event application.

value_schema.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application.

parameters.name: contact_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the contact, such as an email or internal ID.

value_schema.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.

parameters.name: participation_state_filter
parameters.description: The participation state to filter results. Possible values: REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW.

value_schema.description: The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW

parameters.name: response_size_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of participations to retrieve. Default is 10, maximum is 100.

value_schema.description: The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item, used for pagination.

value_schema.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: contactIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.

value_schema.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW

value_schema.description: The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100

value_schema.description: The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.

value_schema.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.

parameters.name: externalAccountId
parameters.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application.

value_schema.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application.

parameters.name: externalEventId
parameters.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application.

value_schema.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
